description: [Agrius](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1030) typically deploys a variant of the [ASPXSpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0073) web shell following initial access via exploitation.(Citation: SentinelOne Agrius 2021)

external_references.description: Amitai Ben & Shushan Ehrlich. (2021, May). From Wiper to Ransomware: The Evolution of Agrius. Retrieved May 21, 2024.
